meanings: if so, if that is the case, then.

vlive.korean: [그렇다면 바팩의 주제는?] [Then what will their topic be?] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 24. 파이널 2라운드! [코디 X 대힙래퍼] 콜라보 무대가 시작된다!
그렇다면 여러분들은 불백 어때요? 돼지 불백! Then, how does marinated pork sound? 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍀🍀
vlive.english: Then, how does marinated pork sound?

vlive.korean: 그렇다면 50번째 '우. 얘. 합' 때는 뭘 하는 게 좋을까요 여러분? Then what should I do during the 50th "Let's Talk"? 듣기 View video N.Flying : 우리 얘기 좀 합시다 #49
vlive.english: Then what should I do during the 50th "Let's Talk"?

vlive.korean: 그렇다면 포스텍의 피펑크가... Then POSTECH's P-FUNK will... 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 19. 3억 쯤은 다들 있ㅈㅕ..?? FLEX 터지는 서울대 바팩과 붙을 학교는??
[그렇다면 송민호 코디의 선택은?] [Then what about Song Minho?] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 18. 용인대 리퍼블릭 VS 고려대 테라 배틀에 심사위원 실화?!

examples.korean: Oh well, that accounts for it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오호라, 그렇다면 이해가 되는군. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Oh well, that accounts for it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Oh well then, that explains it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아 좋아, 그렇다면 그게 해명이 되는군. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Oh well then, that explains it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Oh OK, then. Have it your own way. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아, 그렇다면 좋아. 네 마음대로 해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Oh OK, then. Have it your own way. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘He must be dead then?’ ‘I fear so.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그렇다면 그는 분명 사망했겠군요.” “그런 것 같습니다.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘He must be dead then?’ ‘I fear so.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Please come with us.’ ‘Very well then, if you insist.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “제발 우리와 함께 가요.” “좋아요, (당신 주장이) 꼭 그렇다면.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Please come with us.’ ‘Very well then, if you insist.’ Add to Wordbook
